p: Ni showed a similar behavior as Cd in the root–stem system, accumulating more in roots than in the stems and leaves ( p < 0.01). Comparing the root–leaves concentrations, Ni showed p values > 0.05 in the AsCd experiment and p < 0.01 in the AsCdNiPb experiment, both in root, as we expected due to Ni addition ( Table 3).
